thread.title: Nathan

author: Nathan
title: Nathan
text: We had an amazing experience with Rebel Walls. We left our nursery design to the very last minute, so a week or two before our baby arrived we were sprinting to get everything set up. Our wallpaper arrived -- and then our installer botched it, leaving very apparent markings on the underside of the wallpaper. We reached out, and Rebel Walls promptly sent a replacement. Amazing customer service, very understanding of our extenuating circumstances, and overall a fantastic look!
